name: Put This There
description:
Put This There is a small game about the terrifying reality of working in an office. It was made for the Exhausting Games Jam and is not yet formally released. You may pay $5 to get early access to this finished game.

•Avoid your coworkers

•Get work done

•Get Fired

•Hide in the bathroom

•Ignore your calls

•ENTER DATA

Background used with permission from Pixabay.

Note: Like all of my games, I don't support MACOSX, but it may still run. The .app is provided as a courtesy for those who want to try anyway, but is not supported. -E
